Title: Black Panther
Writer: Ryan Coogler, Joe Robert Cole, Stan Lee (based on the Marvel comics by), Jack Kirby (based on the Marvel Comics by)
Actors: Chadwick Boseman, Michael B. Jordan, Lupita Nyong'o, Danai Gurira
Plot: After the death of his father, Prince T'Challa ascends to the throne of the small African country of Wakanda. T'Challa is also Black Panther, superhero. Now not only must he govern his country but defeat a dangerous adversary.
Country: USA, South Africa, South Korea, Australia
